resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157087</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157087</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1013</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friendship Album</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freundschaft-Album</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Album d'Amitié</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Album Do Friendship</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Album Di Amicizia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεύκωμα φιλίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Álbum De la Amistad</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An elementry school project which teaches the children how to write up a project on friendship while using the advantages of the computer. May also be used in higher levels when teaching English as a second language</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friendship album together</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friends</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein elementry Schuleprojekt, das den Kindern 
beibringt, wie man ein Projekt auf Freundschaft beim Verwenden der 
Vorteile des Computers aufschreibt. Mag in den höheren Stufen 
auch verwendet werden, wenn, Englisch als zweite Sprache 
unterrichtend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un projet elementry d'école qui enseigne aux 
enfants comment préparer un projet sur l'amitié tout en en utilisant
les avantages de l'ordinateur. Peut également être utilisé 
dans des niveaux plus élevés en enseignant l'anglais comme deuxième
langage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um projeto elementry da escola que ensine às 
crianças como escrever acima de um projeto no friendship ao usar as 
vantagens do computador. Pode também ser usado em uns níveis 
mais elevados ao ensinar o inglês como uma segunda língua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un progetto elementry della scuola che insegna ai
bambini come preparare un progetto su amicizia mentre usando i 
vantaggi del calcolatore. Può anche essere usato nei livelli 
elevati quando insegnano l'inglese come secondo linguaggio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα elementry σχολικό πρόγραμμα που διδάσκει τα 
παιδιά πώς να ετοιμάσει ένα πρόγραμμα για τη φιλία 
χρησιμοποιώντας τα πλεονεκτήματα του υπολογιστή. Μάιος 
επίσης χρησιμοποιείται στα πιό υψηλά επίπεδα κατά το διδασκαλία
των αγγλικών ως δεύτερη γλώσσα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un proyecto elementry de la escuela que enseña a
niños cómo preparar un proyecto sobre amistad mientras que usa las 
ventajas del ordenador. Puede también ser utilizado en niveles 
más altos al enseñar inglés como segundo lenguaje</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freundschaftalbum zusammen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freunde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">album d'amitié ensemble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">album do friendship junto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">amigos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">album di amicizia insieme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">amici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεύκωμα φιλίας από κοινού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φίλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">álbum de la amistad junto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">amigos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

          </identifier>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">13-16</string>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

            <value>compulsory education</value>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

                <string language="en">Friendship</string>

        </classification>
      </lom>

  </description>
